page.title: NetBox
page.description: Network documentation and IPAM/DCIM platform running inside Home Assistant.

reset_superuser.name: Reset admin credentials
reset_superuser.description: Create or reset the NetBox admin user to admin/admin on next start. Turn off again after you log in.

allowed_hosts.name: Allowed hosts
allowed_hosts.description: Hosts allowed to reach NetBox (comma-separated hostnames, IPs, or wildcards, e.g. homeassistant.local, 192.168.1.10, *.example.com). CIDR ranges like 10.3.2.0/24 are not supported. Set * to allow any host on your LAN.

enable_prometheus.name: Enable Prometheus metrics
enable_prometheus.description: Expose NetBox metrics at /metrics for scraping.

plugins.name: NetBox plugins
plugins.description: Comma-separated plugin module names to enable (e.g. netbox_topology_views,netbox_dns). Bundled choices: netbox_topology_views, netbox_dns, netbox_ping, netbox_plugin_extensions. Leave blank to disable all.
